attributes.action: Raise awareness in the Asian community to report abuse/grooming cases
attributes.additional_details: To work with the Asian community to speak out about abuse/grooming cases and not to put such an emphasis on 'Honour'. Due to the issue of Honour many Asian families don't speak out about child grooming or domestic abuse/abuse with the fear it will destroy the family honour. I want to raise awareness that it is okay to speak out and for the police to do more to help.
